sentence: In Hialeah, Rebecca Brady, a mother of four and director of the Respect Life Ministry of the Archdiocese of Miami, said she has been trying to maintain a cautious optimism since she learned of the draft Supreme Court opinion overturning Roe v. Wade that Politico leaked Monday night.? BANNED Ron DeSantis is persona non grata at a Holocaust Memorial,? title: DeSantis scrutinizes health care costs for the undocumented
